   19: %%
   20: %%
   21: -module(inets_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   24: -include("inets_test_lib.hrl").
   25: 
   26: %% Note: This directive should only be used in test suites.
   27: -compile(export_all).
   28: 
   29: -define(NUM_DEFAULT_SERVICES, 1).
   30: 
   31: suite() -> 
   32:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   33:      {timetrap,{seconds,5}}
   34:     ].
   35: 
   36: all() -> 
   37:     [{group, app_test}, 
   38:      {group, services_test}, httpd_reload].
   39: 
   40: groups() -> 
   41:     [{services_test, [],
   42:       [start_inets, 
   43:        start_httpc, 
   44:        start_httpd
   45:       ]},
   46:      {app_test, [], [app, appup]}].
   47: 
   48: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   49:     Config.
   50: 
   51: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   52:     ok.
   53: 
   54: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   55:     Config.
   56: 
   57: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   58:     Config.
   59: 
   60: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
   61:     inets:stop(),
   62:     Config.
   63: 
   64: end_per_testcase(_, Config) ->
   65:     Config.
   66: 
   67: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
   68: %% Test cases starts here.
   69: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
   70: app() ->
   71:     [{doc, "Test that the inets app file is ok"}].
   72: app(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   73:     ok = test_server:app_test(inets).
   74: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   75: appup() ->
   76:     [{doc, "Test that the inets appup file is ok"}].
   77: appup(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   78:     ok = test_server:appup_test(inets).
   79: 
   80: start_inets() ->
   81:     [{doc, "Test inets API functions"}].
   82: start_inets(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   83:     [_|_] = inets:service_names(),
   84: 
   85:     {error,inets_not_started} = inets:services(),
   86:     {error,inets_not_started} = inets:services_info(),
   87: 
   88:     ok = inets:start(),
   89:     
   90:     %% httpc default profile always started
   91:     [_|_] = inets:services(), 
   92:     [_|_] =  inets:services_info(),
   93: 
   94:     {error,{already_started,inets}} = inets:start(),
   95:     
   96:     ok = inets:stop(),
   97:     {error,{not_started,inets}} = inets:stop(),
   98: 
   99:     ok = inets:start(transient),
  100:     ok = inets:stop(),
  101:    
  102:     ok = inets:start(permanent),
  103:     ok = inets:stop().
  104: 
  105: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  106: 
  107: start_httpc() ->
  108:     [{doc, "Start/stop of httpc service"}].
  109: start_httpc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  110:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  111:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  112: 
  113:     ok = inets:start(),
  114:     {ok, Pid0} = inets:start(httpc, [{profile, foo}]),
  115: 
  116:     Pids0 =  [ServicePid || {_, ServicePid} <- inets:services()],  
  117:     true = lists:member(Pid0, Pids0),
  118:     [_|_] = inets:services_info(),	
  119: 
  120:     inets:stop(httpc, Pid0),
  121: 
  122:     ct:sleep(100),
  123: 
  124:     Pids1 =  [ServicePid || {_, ServicePid} <- inets:services()], 
  125:     false = lists:member(Pid0, Pids1),        
  126: 
  127:     {ok, Pid1} = inets:start(httpc, [{profile, bar}], stand_alone),
  128: 
  129:     Pids2 =  [ServicePid || {_, ServicePid} <- inets:services()], 
  130:     false = lists:member(Pid1, Pids2),   
  131: 
  132:     ok = inets:stop(stand_alone, Pid1),
  133:     receive 
  134: 	{'EXIT', Pid1, shutdown} ->
  135: 	    ok
  136:     after 100 ->
  137: 	    ct:fail(stand_alone_not_shutdown)
  138:     end,
  139: 
  140:     ok = inets:stop(),
  141: 
  142:     application:load(inets),
  143:     application:set_env(inets, services, [{httpc,[{profile, foo}, 
  144: 						  {data_dir, PrivDir}]}]),
  145:     ok = inets:start(),
  146: 
  147:     (?NUM_DEFAULT_SERVICES + 1) = length(inets:services()),
  148: 
  149:     application:unset_env(inets, services),
  150:     ok = inets:stop(),
  151:     ok = inets:start(),
  152: 
  153:     {ok, Pid3} = inets:start(httpc, [{profile, foo}]),
  154:     ok = inets:stop(httpc, foo),
  155:     Pids3 =  [ServicePid || {_, ServicePid} <- inets:services()], 
  156:     false = lists:member(Pid3, Pids3),      
  157:     ok = inets:stop().
  158: 
  159: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  160: 
  161: start_httpd() ->
  162:     [{doc, "Start/stop of httpd service"}].
  163: start_httpd(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  164:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  165:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  166:     HttpdConf = [{server_root, PrivDir}, {document_root, PrivDir}, {bind_address, any}],
  167:     
  168:     ok = inets:start(),
  169:     {ok, Pid0} = inets:start(httpd, [{port, 0}, {ipfamily, inet} | HttpdConf]),
  170:     Pids0 =  [ServicePid || {_, ServicePid} <- inets:services()],  
  171:     true = lists:member(Pid0, Pids0),
  172:     [_|_] = inets:services_info(),	
  173:     inets:stop(httpd, Pid0),
  174:     Pids1 =  [ServicePid || {_, ServicePid} <- inets:services()],
  175:     false = lists:member(Pid0, Pids1),
  176:     {ok, Pid0b} =
  177: 	inets:start(httpd, [{port, 0}, {ipfamily, inet6fb4} | HttpdConf]),
  178:     Pids0b =  [ServicePid || {_, ServicePid} <- inets:services()],
  179:     true = lists:member(Pid0b, Pids0b),
  180:     [_|_] = inets:services_info(),
  181:     inets:stop(httpd, Pid0b),
  182:     Pids1 =  [ServicePid || {_, ServicePid} <- inets:services()], 
  183:     false = lists:member(Pid0b, Pids1),
  184:     {ok, Pid1} = 
  185: 	inets:start(httpd, [{port, 0}, {ipfamily, inet} | HttpdConf], 
  186: 		    stand_alone),
  187:     Pids2 =  [ServicePid || {_, ServicePid} <- inets:services()], 
  188:     false = lists:member(Pid1, Pids2),   
  189:     ok = inets:stop(stand_alone, Pid1),
  190:     receive 
  191: 	{'EXIT', Pid1, shutdown} ->
  192: 	    ok
  193:     after 100 ->
  194: 	    ct:fail(stand_alone_not_shutdown)
  195:     end,
  196:     ok = inets:stop(),
  197:     File0 = filename:join(PrivDir, "httpd.conf"),
  198:     {ok, Fd0} =  file:open(File0, [write]),
  199:     Str = io_lib:format("~p.~n", [[{port, 0}, {ipfamily, inet} | HttpdConf]]),
  200:     ok = file:write(Fd0, Str),
  201:     file:close(Fd0),
  202: 
  203:     application:load(inets),
  204:     application:set_env(inets, 
  205: 			services, [{httpd, [{proplist_file, File0}]}]),
  206:     ok = inets:start(),
  207:     (?NUM_DEFAULT_SERVICES + 1) = length(inets:services()),
  208:     application:unset_env(inets, services),
  209:     ok = inets:stop().
  210: 
  211: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  212: 
  213: httpd_reload() ->
  214:     [{doc, "Reload httpd configuration without restarting service"}].
  215: httpd_reload(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  216:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  217:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  218:     DataDir =  proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  219:     HttpdConf = [{server_name,   "httpd_test"}, 
  220: 		 {server_root,   PrivDir},
  221: 		 {document_root, PrivDir}, 
  222: 		 {bind_address,  "localhost"}],
  223: 
  224:     ok = inets:start(),
  225: 
  226:     {ok, Pid0} = inets:start(httpd, [{port, 0}, 
  227: 				     {ipfamily, inet} | HttpdConf]),
  228: 
  229:     [{port, Port0}] = httpd:info(Pid0, [port]),         
  230: 
  231:     [{document_root, PrivDir}] =  httpd:info(Pid0, [document_root]),
  232: 
  233:     ok = httpd:reload_config([{port, Port0}, {ipfamily, inet},
  234: 			      {server_name, "httpd_test"}, 
  235: 			      {server_root, PrivDir},
  236: 			      {document_root, DataDir}, 
  237: 			      {bind_address, "localhost"}], non_disturbing),
  238:     [{document_root, DataDir}] =  httpd:info(Pid0, [document_root]),
  239: 
  240:     ok = httpd:reload_config([{port, Port0}, {ipfamily, inet},
  241: 			      {server_name, "httpd_test"}, 
  242: 			      {server_root, PrivDir},
  243: 			      {document_root, PrivDir}, 
  244: 			      {bind_address, "localhost"}], disturbing),
  245: 
  246:     [{document_root, PrivDir}] =  httpd:info(Pid0, [document_root]),
  247:     ok = inets:stop(httpd, Pid0),
  248:     ok = inets:stop().
